DKDEPEND(smpeg2-2.0.0)

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(http://digitalknob.com/Download/Libs/smpeg2-2.0.0.tar smpeg2-2.0.0)
DKSET(SMPEG2 ${3RDPARTY}/smpeg2-2.0.0)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${SMPEG2}/src)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Debug/smpeg2.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Release/smpeg2.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libsmpeg2.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libsmpeg2.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Debug/libsmpeg2.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Release/libsmpeg2.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libsmpeg2.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libsmpeg2.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /GR /EHsc" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${SMPEG2})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2.sln smpeg2)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2.sln smpeg2)

DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${X64GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${SMPEG2})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2.sln smpeg2)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2.sln smpeg2)

DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 ${SMPEG2})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)

DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS ${SMPEG2})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)

DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR ${SMPEG2})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0 smpeg2)


DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG ${SMPEG2})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make smpeg2)

DKSETPATH(${SMPEG2}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE ${SMPEG2})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make smpeg2)


ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(smpeg2-2.0.0)
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(smpeg2-2.0.0)
